import React, {useEffect,useState} from "react"; // import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button' // components import Coursepic from "components/Course/Coursepic"; export default function Addtablecourse() { const [addcourse, setAddcourse] = useState(null); const [form, setForm] = useState({ index : "", coursename :"" , coursetitle : "", mentorname: "", coursetype : "", regiistrations : "", courseduration : "", topics:"", details:"", curriculum:"", coursepicture:"" }); const [isSubmitting, setIsSubmitting] = useState(false); useEffect(() => { fetchCourse(); }, []) const fetchCourse = async () => { setIsSubmitting(true); const res = await fetch('/addcourse'); const data = await res.json(); setIsSubmitting(false); setAddcourse(data); } const handleChange = (e) => { setForm({ ...form, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }) } const validate = () => { let err = {}; if(!form.index){ err.index='index is required' } if(!form.coursename){ err.coursename='course name is required' } if(!form.coursetitle){ err.coursetitle='course title is required' } // if(!form.mentor){ // err.mentor='mentor name is required' // } if(!form.coursetype){ err.coursetype='course type is required' } if(!form.mentorname){ err.mentorname='mentor name is required' } if(!form.curriculum){ err.curriculum='curriculum is required' } if(!form.courseduration){ err.courseduration='course duration is required' } return err; } const showError = (errorObj) => { let errMsg = ''; for(let err in errorObj){ errMsg += `${errorObj[err]}. `; } alert(`Errors ${errMsg}`); } const postCourses = async (data) => { await fetch('/addcourse', { method: 'POST', headers:{ 'Accept' : 'application/json', 'Content-Type' : 'application/json' }, body : JSON.stringify(data) }) } const handleSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); const errors = validate(); if(Object.keys(errors).length === 0){ setIsSubmitting(true); await postCourses(form); setIsSubmitting(false); setForm({ index : "", coursename :"" , coursetitle : "", mentorname: "", coursetype : "", regiistrations : "", courseduration : "", topics:"", details:"", curriculum:"", coursepicture:"" }) fetchCourse(); }else{ showError(errors); } } return ( <>
Add Course
{isSubmitting ? (

Loading...

) : ('')}
Course Information
Course Description
Image

{/* */}
{JSON.stringify(addcourse,null,8)}
); }
